Comments_List: In this class, I learned a lot about statistics, especially how to use R programming to conduct statistical analysis. Currently I learned about how to use these skills to do some research work including data analysis.
Basic stat knowledge applied in R
I gained extensive data cleaning skills and brushed up on statistical skills.

Entry-level  R programming skill
Broad statistical knowledge
the use of R to deal with real statistical analysis

The strengths include the systematical knowledge structure, which combine the knowledge of statistics with R programming, and the video record can help us to review the class contents in time. Temperately I did not find some specific weaknesses for this class.
The course have the recording videos, it's easy to catch up after class.
Course was good and provided great introductory learning on analysis using R.

I think the course was very strong overall. The only thing I would suggest for improvement would be to perhaps make one of the exams an in-class exam so that we are forced to study some of the statistics more.
we can look at videos even we missed the class.

I will strongly recommend this class to other students who is interested with data analysis, especially you want to learn R language. In this class, You will definitely learn a lot of useful knowledge on  statistics and practical programming language.
Yes I will.This course help with our basic Rlanguage from the very beginning.
Yes, for students looking for learning R and having basic stat knowledge. A lot of available office hours per week to help students understand the lecture and finish the homework
This course is an essential course for any student wishing to work with data. I have taken other classes at Yale and this one is by far the best for this type of learning.
I will. it is a good basic class as an entrance to R language and the final project is also a real practice to use the knowledge we learn in class.
